DOC.brief_summary: Soccer sport attract many participant lead substantial number injury , especially ankle . Enhancement functional joint stability kinesio tap proprioceptive training may important prevention rehabilitation ankle injury . The main aim study determine effect kinesio tap proprioceptive exercise parameter related ankle stability , injury incidence , pain , static dynamic stability flexibility , amateur soccer player train 3 time week .
DOC.brief_title: Study Effect Kinesio Taping Proprioceptive Exercise Stability Ankle Amateur Soccer Players
DOC.criteria: To older 18 year old . To soccer player 5 year . Serious illness . Recent ankle injury Vestibulocerebellar disorder Allergy Kinesio tap Inability complete interventional session reason
